研究称空气污染可能通过氧化应激影响男性生殖接触空气污染物对男性生育参数和性健康的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Air-pollution-may-affect-male-reproductive-via-oxygenative-stress-says-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Air-pollution-may-affect-male-reproductive-via-oxygen-stress-says-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=12a88131-c368-4002-840d-60711e99e510 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 05:05:00 -0500 Air pollution may affect male reproduction via oxidative stress, says study
人工智能整合对抗年龄相关性黄斑变性在这次采访中，对抗年龄相关性黄斑变性 (AAAMD) 的首席执行官兼首席科学家 Wen Hwa Lee 提出了关于将人工智能与眼科相结合以开辟医疗保健和药物发现新途径的启发性观点。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/AI-Integration-in-the-Fight-Against-Age-Related-Macular-Degenesis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/AI-Integration-in-the-Fight-Against-Age-Related-Macular-Degenesis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d857236c-a6dc-4216-a510-ee808f851e04 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 04:46:00 -0500 AI Integration in the Fight Against Age-Related Macular Degeneration

一个人生活？收养宠物可能有助于减缓老年人的认知能力下降研究人员调查了养宠物与老年人认知能力下降之间的关系。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Living-alone-Adopting-a-pet-might-help-slow-cognitive-decline-among-older-adults.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Living-alone-Adopting-a-pet-might-help-slow-cognitive-decline-among-older-adults.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e5eca422-920e-43b8-ac50-1d8a543a25df Wed, 03 Jan 2024 03:43:00 -0500 Living alone? Adopting a pet might help slow cognitive decline among older adults

住院的 COVID-19 患者是否有长期的认知、精神或神经并发症？研究人员评估了因 COVID-19 住院的患者的精神、神经和认知并发症是否与患有类似严重程度的其他疾病的患者不同。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Do-hospitalized-COVID-19-患者-have-long-term-cognitive-psychiatric-or-neurological-complications.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240103/Do-hospitalized-COVID-19-患者-have-long-term-cognitive-psychiatric-or-neurological-complications.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6a1365af-dca0-45ab-91e1-9dbab899d3e6 Wed, 03 Jan 2024 03:20:00 -0500 Do hospitalized COVID-19 patients have long-term cognitive, psychiatric, or neurological complications?
混合免疫在遏制 COVID-19 中的作用：加拿大研究揭示了疫苗与感染的协同作用研究评估了混合免疫对加拿大成年人 SARS-CoV-2 抗体水平的影响，表明混合免疫结合疫苗接种和感染恢复可显着降低 COVID-19 发病率和死亡率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Hybrid-immunitys-role-in-curbing-COVID-19-Canadian-study-sheds-light-on-vaccine-infection-synergy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Hybrid-immunitys-role-in-curbing-COVID-19-Canadian-study-sheds-light-on-vaccine-infection-synergy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ea6003a6-6bf3-4ae6-a5a5-c19b296b0fe2 Tue, 02 Jan 2024 23:50:00 -0500 Hybrid immunity's role in curbing COVID-19: Canadian study sheds light on vaccine-infection synergy
研究敦促撒哈拉以南非洲地区采用多种作物以确保营养安全一项重大研究表明，撒哈拉以南非洲的农民需要实现多样化，不再种植玉米，而是转向种植能够抵御气候变化并为人口提供足够关键微量营养素的作物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Study-urges-sub-Saharan-Africa-to-embrace-diverse-crops-for-nutritional-security.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Study-urges-sub-Saharan-Africa-to-embrace-diverse-crops-for-nutritional-security.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=955a8408-c3fb-4d76-b7b7-fd19cf7d0e08 Tue, 02 Jan 2024 23:43:07 -0500 Study urges sub-Saharan Africa to embrace diverse crops for nutritional security
最佳沙拉填满宇航员的盘子并为长期太空任务提供燃料想象一下，以清淡的预包装膳食为燃料，踏上前往火星的多年航行。当航天机构计划执行更长时间的任务时，他们正在努力应对如何最好地为人们提供食物的挑战。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Optimal-salad-fills-astronauts-plates-and-fuels-long-term-space-missions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240102/Optimal-salad-fills-astronauts-plates-and-fuels-long-term-space-missions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25e0a915-7c3b-4feb-8d26-21e24c32272e Tue, 02 Jan 2024 23:31:09 -0500 Optimal salad fills astronauts' plates and fuels long-term space missions
